DOC.detailed_description: Background : Nursing home ( NH ) patient complex mental health problem , disability social need , compound widespread prescription psychotropic drug . To preserve dignity quality life important goal society . This achieve within NHs offer high competent condition treatment care . Research question hypotheses : 1 . Will implementation communication end-of-life decision make process impact interaction patient , staff family ? We hypothesize ACP improve interaction patient , staff family , satisfaction relative thereby improve quality life NH patient . 2 . Is KOSMOS capable affect agitation aggression reduce medication e.g . psychotropics NH patient ? We hypothesize KOSMOS significantly reduce agitation aggression , total amount medication , psychotropic drug use . 3 . What combination intervention give broad benefit , could deliver routine intervention part NH practice ? We hypothesize comprehensive KOSMOS approach improve QoL make positive change NH practice . 4 . What type advantage expect ? We hypothesize KOSMOS cost-effective approach , potential increase safety reduce mortality NH patient . Method : The KOSMOS intervention combine effective research result improve staff competence , patient ' mental health , safety , QoL , reduce psychotropic drug use cost . The efficacy test KOSMOS include systematic literature review , pilot study , 9-month randomize control trial ( RCT ) , dissemination plan . Data collection take place baseline , month 4 , 9 . The intervention entail provision staff training , study guideline manual . NHs randomize either KOSMOS current best practice . We include 38 NH long-term-care ( LTC ) ward ( normally one ward per NH ) Bergen , Stavanger , Oslo/Bærum , Sarpsborg Sogn Fjordane . In total 310 patient ≥65 year recruit ward Primary secondary outcome measure : Quality life late stage dementia ( QUALID ) , QUALIDEM , EQ-5-D ; Neuropsychiatric Inventory - NH edition ( NPI-NH ) ; Activities Daily Living ( ADL ) ; Cornell ; Mobilization - Observation - Behaviour - Intensity - Dementia 2 ( MOBID-2 ) ; drug use ; drug-related problem , START ; STOP ; cost-utility analysis ( RUD-FOCA ) ; hospital admission ; mortality , ActiWatch ; Log registration NH activity ; Relatives satisfaction conduct KOSMOS element Statistical analysis : include characteristic 2 group ( Chi square , Mann-Whitney U ) , ANCOVA , ICC p-values time-point outcome .
